header.h1: All of The Plans Above Include :

div.p: No installation needed. Access anywhere, anytime, any device - with an internet browser
Add as many users you want easily in admin module (without breaking the hosting)
No need to invest in server. Enjoy world class hosting with guaranteed uptime of 99.9%
Top security facilty & backup at No 1 data center in Msia, AIMS for you platform & data

div.h1: Dedicated Software & Development for Your Pool
div.p:
While a lot of features are needed, it’s expensive to build. We made it affordable for you, by building the common ones for a pool of manufacturers who need it.
Every pool of subsribers will have a dedicated team to develop what you all need.

Produce by parts & BOM
Process

Produce by chemical & recipe
Process

header.h1: A Cloud Solution By The Crowd, For The Crowd
header.p:
In essence, we are providing an ongoing service to you, instead of a product.
We gather what you all need, and the priorities. Then work out the solution together by adopting some of the best practices from you subscribers. This way everyone get the best solution for what they need.

div.p: Raise request for new feature/functionality you need on our Forum.
You subscribers in the pool will vote for the feature to develop for the month
We assess all the requests, its needs and the solution by votes & talking to you guys
The features (solution) to be developed will be announced on the forum
The new features will be roll out to all in the pool with notification & guide

header.h2: Just Get Hosting Upgrade, When You Need To Scale Up

div.p:
*The number of concurrent users that can be supported is a rough estimate, based on the average usage.
It depends on many factors, like the type of app being used, the type of transactions you are doing etc.
Most importantly, the choice to upgrade is yours to make. You can adjust around, if the performance is still acceptable.

header.h2: Giving Your Team The Help Needed to Succeed

div.div: Essential care for your team to get started and go far
Higher touch and prioritized support for more demanding operation and team
Deeper partnership with dedicated personnel taking care of your business on cloud
